alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Inland Camden (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 10 at 1:01PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Camden County through 115 PM EST... At 101 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Kingsland, moving northwest at 55 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kingsland. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EST for southeastern Georgia.
